company_info.Company Description: Vision 2025 On 1st January 2025, Talent Corner will be an Organization, having operations in 10 Countries, with 100 Offices & a Team of 1000 People ,Successfully Executing 10000 Recruitment Assignments every Year. We would have recruited 1,00,000 People by then.For every Successful Recruitment we will invest Rs. 100 towards Girl Child Education, thus by 2025 we would have educated 1000 Girls”
company_info.Company Name: Talent Corner HR Services Pvt Ltd

jd_information.description: Writing travel articles, aviation news, tourism news, long-form features. Brainstorming and Selection of topics based on destinations, tourism seasons and target audience. Writing keyword-centric articles for search engine optimization / online marketing. Surfing Internet for accurate information and facts on selected topics. Writing compelling tweets and updating Facebook page with easy to read, brief posts. Keeping a watch on the travel, tourism and aviation industry.
